content.question: Which of the following best describes a symbiotic relationship?

choices.label: Striped bass and bluefish eat the same variety of mackerel.
Intestinal bacteria inhabit the gut of humans.
Mountain lions feed on white-tailed deer.
Marsupial animals carry their young in a pouch.

content.answer: Intestinal bacteria inhabit the gut of humans.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe environmental concepts and processes.
